## Protocol.Page.SecureContextType type

Indicates whether the frame is a secure context and why it is the case.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type SecureContextType = ('Secure' | 'SecureLocalhost' | 'InsecureScheme' | 'InsecureAncestor');
```
